narrative.title: 10 Panzer Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: German panzer_division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored division for combined-arms offensive operations at Kasserine Pass. Arrived from France December 1942 for Tunisia Campaign. Partnered with 21st Panzer Division for offensive operations.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Mixed terrain - Coastal plain, mountainous passes (Kasserine), desert wadis. Cooler and wetter than Western Desert.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Experienced panzer tactics from Eastern Front
Tiger tank attached (s.Pz.Abt. 501) provides exceptional firepower

environment.terrain_type: Mixed terrain - Coastal plain, mountainous passes (Kasserine), desert wadis. Cooler and wetter than Western Desert.
